Look, i found a solution for fixing the burning problem. Follow the steps and you will be able to burn both of the CD's.

1-Open the CD1 cue file with notepad
2-Now change the first and only line from this:
FILE "RAT1-JFKPC.BIN" BINARY
  TRACK 01 MODE1/2352
    INDEX 01 00:00:00

To this:
FILE "Ratatouille - CD1.bin" BINARY
  TRACK 01 MODE1/2352
    INDEX 01 00:00:00

3- Now burn the first CD and do the same thing with the CD2 file but in place of: FILE "Ratatouille - CD1.bin" put FILE "Ratatouille - CD2.bin"
the files were renamed after they were created so the info in the cue files is wrong...

Ok Here is the solution, u just need to mount the images to be able to launch the installation, but to do that u need to rename the bin and cue files bcuz the name are corrupted
Just rename CD1 .cue & .bin to RAT1-JFKPC and CD2 .cue & .bin to RAT2-JFKPC
Now u can mount them without any error
